S0001.known: I want to speak Spanish with you now.

S0003.known: how to speak as often as possible
S0003.target: cómo hablar lo más frecuentamente posible

S0004.known: how to say something in Spanish

S0005.known: I'm going to practise speaking with someone else.
S0005.target: Voy a practicar hablar con alguien más.

S0006.known: I'm trying to remember a word.

S0007.known: I want to try as hard as I can today.
S0007.target: Quiero intentar tan duro como pueda hoy.

S0008.known: I'm going to try to explain what I mean.
S0008.target: Voy a intentar explicar lo que quiero decir.

S0009.known: I speak a little Spanish now.
S0009.target: Hablo un poco de español ahora.

S0010.known: I'm not sure if I can remember the whole sentence.
S0010.target: No estoy seguro si puedo recordar toda la oración.

S0011.known: I'd like to be able to speak after you finish.
S0011.target: Me gustaría poder hablar después de que termines.

S0012.known: I wouldn't like to guess what's going to happen tomorrow.
S0012.target: No me gustaría adivinar lo que va a ocurrir mañana.

S0014.known: Do you speak Spanish all day?

S0015.known: And I want you to speak Spanish with me tomorrow.
S0015.target: Y quiero que hables español conmigo mañana.

S0016.known: He wants to come back with everyone else later on.
S0016.target: Él quiere volver con todos los demás más tarde.

S0017.known: She wants to find out what the answer is.
S0017.target: Ella quiere descubrir cuál es la respuesta.

S0018.known: We want to meet at six o'clock this evening.
S0018.target: Queremos reunirnos a las seis esta noche.

S0019.known: But I don't want to stop talking.
S0019.target: Pero no quiero parar de hablar.

S0020.known: You want to learn his name quickly.

S0021.known: Why are you learning her name?

S0022.known: Because I want to meet people who speak Spanish.
S0022.target: Porque quiero encontrar personas que hablan español.

S0023.known: I'm going to start talking more soon.
S0023.target: Voy a comenzar a hablar más pronto.

S0024.known: I'm not going to be able to remember easily.
S0024.target: No voy a poder recordar fácilmente.

S0025.known: Are you going to help me before I have to go?
S0025.target: ¿Vas a ayudarme antes de que tenga que ir?

S0026.known: I like feeling as if I'm nearly ready to go.
S0026.target: Me gusta sentir como si estuviera casi preparado para ir.

S0027.known: I don't like taking too much time to answer.
S0027.target: No me gusta tomar demasiado tiempo para responder.

S0028.known: It's useful to start talking as soon as you can.
S0028.target: Es útil comenzar a hablar tan pronto como puedas.

S0029.known: I'm looking forward to speaking better as soon as I can.
S0029.target: Estoy deseando hablar mejor tan pronto como pueda.

S0030.known: I wanted to ask you something yesterday.

S0031.known: You wanted to speak with me tonight.

S0032.known: Did you want to show me something?

S0033.known: How long have you been learning Spanish?

S0034.known: He doesn't want to be quiet when other people are here.
S0034.target: Él no quiere estar silencioso cuando otras personas están aquí.

S0035.known: She doesn't want to read anything this afternoon.
S0035.target: Ella no quiere leer nada esta tarde.

S0036.known: We don't want to interrupt the story.

S0037.known: I started to think about it carefully last month.
S0037.target: Comencé a pensar sobre eso cuidadosamente el mes pasado.

S0038.known: I've been learning for about a week.

S0039.known: But I'm a little tired this morning.
S0039.target: Pero estoy un poco cansado esta mañana.

S0040.known: How do you feel at the moment?

S0041.known: I feel okay, but I'm starting to feel tired.
S0041.target: Me siento bien, pero estoy comenzando a sentirme cansado.

S0042.known: I was starting to feel better than last night.
S0042.target: Estaba comenzando a sentirme mejor que anoche.

S0043.known: I wasn't thinking about how to answer.
S0043.target: No estaba pensando en cómo responder.

S0044.known: Or if I need to improve.

S0045.known: I don't need to know everything.

S0046.known: But I don't worry about making mistakes.
S0046.target: Pero no me preocupo por hacer errores.

S0047.known: Because I think that it's a good thing to make mistakes.
S0047.target: Porque pienso que es una cosa buena hacer errores.

S0048.known: I don't care about making mistakes.

S0049.known: It's like this, if you know what I mean.
S0049.target: Es así, si sabes lo que quiero decir.

S0050.known: I'm not trying to finish as quickly as possible.
S0050.target: No estoy intentando terminar lo más rápidamente posible.

S0051.known: I enjoy doing interesting things with my friends.
S0051.target: Disfruto hacer cosas interesantes con mis amigos.

S0052.known: He wanted to write a letter to his friend last week.
S0052.target: Quería escribir una carta a su amigo la semana pasada.

S0053.known: She wanted to put his letter in her bag.
S0053.target: Quería poner su carta en su bolsa.

S0054.known: We wanted to give you a little more time.
S0054.target: Queríamos darte un poco más de tiempo.

S0055.known: I don't enjoy waking up when I didn't sleep very well.
S0055.target: No disfruto despertarme cuando no dormí muy bien.

S0056.known: So I can remember how to say a few words.
S0056.target: Para poder recordar cómo decir unas pocas palabras.

S0057.known: I can't remember how to say what I wanted to say.
S0057.target: No puedo recordar cómo decir lo que quería decir.

S0058.known: It's interesting when you understand enough words.
S0058.target: Es interesante cuando comprendes suficientes palabras.

S0059.known: I know how to do what I need to do next week.
S0059.target: Sé hacer lo que necesito hacer la próxima semana.

S0060.known: I don't know how to say enough different words yet.
S0060.target: Todavía no sé cómo decir suficientes palabras diferentes.

S0061.known: Could you say that again a little more slowly?
S0061.target: ¿Podrías decir eso otra vez un poco más lentamente?

S0062.known: I'm not sure if I can help you at the same time.
S0062.target: No estoy seguro si puedo ayudarte al mismo tiempo.

S0063.known: Are you sure you don't mind helping me?
S0063.target: ¿Estás seguro de que no te importa ayudarme?

S0064.known: Learning Spanish isn't easy but it is fun.
S0064.target: Aprender español no es fácil pero es divertido.

S0065.known: It's important to take time to test yourself.
S0065.target: Es importante tomar tiempo para evaluarte.

S0066.known: It's not difficult to find the answer.
S0066.target: No es difícil encontrar la respuesta.

S0067.known: Why do you want to stop?

S0069.known: He didn't want to look after the young dog all afternoon.
S0069.target: No quería cuidar el perro joven toda la tarde.

S0070.known: She didn't want to tell me where it was.
S0070.target: Ella no quería decirme dónde estaba.

S0071.known: We didn't want to let anyone hear the truth.
S0071.target: No queríamos permitir que nadie oyera la verdad.

S0072.known: I think that you're doing very well.
S0072.target: Pienso que estás haciendo muy bien.

S0073.known: Thank you very much, but I've got more to learn.
S0073.target: Muchas gracias, pero tengo más que aprender.

S0074.known: Thank you very much for helping me to understand.
S0074.target: Muchas gracias por ayudarme a comprender.

S0075.known: Have you got more to learn?

S0076.known: I'm very happy with how much I've learnt already.
S0076.target: Estoy muy feliz con cuánto he aprendido ya.

S0077.known: I'm surprised at how quickly I'm starting to understand.
S0077.target: Estoy sorprendido de lo rápidamente que estoy comenzando a comprender.

S0078.known: I don't understand what you said.

S0079.known: When did you start to learn?

S0080.known: I'm not sure when I'll be ready.
S0080.target: No estoy seguro de cuándo estaré preparado.

S0081.known: When do you want to start?

S0082.known: I'm not going to wait for you. Why not?
S0082.target: No voy a esperarte. ¿Por qué no?

S0083.known: I agree with what you said about your friend.
S0083.target: Estoy de acuerdo con lo que dijiste sobre tu amigo.

S0084.known: I don't agree with what he said about my friend.
S0084.target: No estoy de acuerdo con lo que dijo sobre mi amigo.

S0087.known: They are people I don't know.

S0088.known: I'm not ready to talk to people I don't know yet.
S0088.target: No estoy preparado para hablar con personas que no conozco todavía.

S0089.known: I think that I've done a lot in a short time.
S0089.target: Pienso que he hecho mucho en un breve tiempo.

S0090.known: If you can speak more slowly that would be great.
S0090.target: Si puedes hablar más lentamente, eso sería excelente.

S0091.known: It's difficult to think quickly enough to answer in time.
S0091.target: Es difícil pensar lo suficientemente rápido para responder a tiempo.

S0092.known: I'd like to keep on doing this for a while.
S0092.target: Me gustaría continuar haciendo esto por un tiempo.

S0094.known: This is the only way it will work.
S0094.target: Esta es la única manera en que funcionará.

S0095.known: Are you ready to go home on the next bus?
S0095.target: ¿Estás preparado para ir a casa en el próximo autobús?

S0096.known: No I'm not ready yet, I need a little more time.
S0096.target: No, no estoy preparado todavía, necesito un poco más de tiempo.

S0097.known: Yes I'm ready to go as soon as you want.
S0097.target: Sí, estoy preparado para ir tan pronto como quieras.

S0098.known: I should consider playing something else.

S0099.known: You should ask yourself why it's not working.
S0099.target: Deberías preguntarte por qué no está trabajando

S0100.known: You shouldn't worry about doing something similar.
S0100.target: No deberías preocuparte por hacer algo similar

S0101.known: I'm enjoying finding out more about this language.
S0101.target: Estoy disfrutando descubrir más sobre este lenguaje

S0102.known: We're trying to say that it's not like that.
S0102.target: Estamos intentando decir que no es así

S0103.known: We're not trying to hear many more words.
S0103.target: No estamos intentando oír muchas más palabras

S0104.known: We need to change what we're doing.
S0104.target: Necesitamos cambiar lo que estamos haciendo

S0105.known: That is why he didn't know the answer.
S0105.target: Por eso no sabía la respuesta

S0106.known: We don't need to feel happy, we just need to work hard.
S0106.target: No necesitamos sentirnos felices, solo necesitamos trabajar duro

S0107.known: We hoped to see what you were doing.
S0107.target: Esperábamos ver lo que estabas haciendo

S0108.known: We didn't hope to wake in the middle of the night.
S0108.target: No esperábamos despertar en el medio de la noche

S0109.known: We must work hard to learn a lot of new words.
S0109.target: Debemos trabajar duro para aprender muchas palabras nuevas

S0110.known: We're friends, and after we finish I'd like to relax.
S0110.target: Somos amigos, y después de que terminemos me gustaría relajarme

S0111.known: When we learn something new it changes our brain.
S0111.target: Cuando aprendemos algo nuevo cambia nuestro cerebro

S0112.known: That was very interesting, and I wasn't expecting it.
S0112.target: Eso fue muy interesante, y no estaba esperándolo

S0113.known: Why can't I remember what you said?
S0113.target: ¿Por qué no puedo recordar lo que dijiste?

S0114.known: I feel as if I'm doing worse today than yesterday.
S0114.target: Siento como si estuviera haciendo peor hoy que ayer.

S0115.known: I don't feel as if I'm ready to have a conversation.
S0115.target: No siento como si estuviera preparado para tener una conversación.

S0116.known: This isn't the best choice I could make.
S0116.target: Esta no es la mejor opción que podría hacer.

S0117.known: I'm definitely doing better than I was last time we talked to each other.
S0117.target: Definitivamente lo estoy haciendo mejor que la última vez que hablamos.

S0118.known: I feel better than I felt when we were in the pub.
S0118.target: Me siento mejor que como me sentía cuando estábamos en el pub.

S0119.known: Can I ask you something before you leave?
S0119.target: ¿Puedo preguntarte algo antes de que te vayas?

S0120.known: It's interesting that you like to go by bus.
S0120.target: Es interesante que te guste ir en autobús.

S0121.known: It's unusual that you don't like to use your car.
S0121.target: Es inusual que no te guste usar tu auto.

S0122.known: It's starting to feel easier and I'm excited about how it's going.
S0122.target: Está empezando a sentirse más fácil y estoy entusiasmado por cómo va.

S0123.known: I think that's a good idea.
S0123.target: Creo que eso es una buena idea.

S0124.known: I thought that was a good idea.
S0124.target: Creí que eso era una buena idea.

S0125.known: I believe that your idea was very good.
S0125.target: Creo que tu idea era muy buena.

S0126.known: This work is changing the shape of my brain.
S0126.target: Este trabajo está cambiando la forma de mi cerebro.

S0127.known: That isn't why I wanted to see you.
S0127.target: Eso no es por qué quería verte.

S0128.known: You're like someone I used to know.

S0129.known: I'm so happy that you're doing so well.
S0129.target: Estoy tan feliz de que te vaya tan bien.

S0130.known: That was a surprise, because he's my friend.
S0130.target: Eso fue una sorpresa, porque es mi amigo.

S0131.known: There are too many ideas going around in my head.
S0131.target: Hay demasiadas ideas dando vueltas en mi cabeza.

S0132.known: That's less exciting than what she was saying.
S0132.target: Eso es menos emocionante que lo que decía.

S0133.known: You get to know someone very well when you work together.
S0133.target: Llegas a conocer muy bien a alguien cuando trabajan juntos.

S0134.known: It's not a problem when you work at something difficult with them.
S0134.target: No es un problema cuando trabajas en algo difícil con ellos.

S0135.known: I don't know why you think that it's so good.
S0135.target: No sé por qué piensas que es tan bueno.

S0136.known: Of course you can ask her because she's my friend.
S0136.target: Por supuesto que puedes preguntarle porque es mi amiga.

S0137.known: It's more important to talk often than to be perfect.
S0137.target: Es más importante hablar frecuentemente que ser perfecto.

S0138.known: This was where my friend wanted to meet us.
S0138.target: Esto era donde mi amigo quería reunirse con nosotros.

S0139.known: I'm sorry that I need to leave so early.
S0139.target: Lo siento que necesito irme tan temprano.

S0140.known: I'm sorry that I can't see what you're trying to show me.
S0140.target: Lo siento que no puedo ver lo que estás intentando mostrarme.

S0141.target: No hay problema. Todo está bien.

S0142.known: That's very kind of you and I'm grateful to you for helping.
S0142.target: Eso es muy amable de tu parte y estoy agradecido a ti por ayudar.

S0143.known: It's the same thing as we were talking about earlier.
S0143.target: Es la misma cosa de la que estábamos hablando antes.

S0144.known: I woke earlier than I wanted to this morning.
S0144.target: Me desperté más temprano de lo que quería esta mañana.

S0145.known: Why are you not happy any more?

S0146.known: Nothing seems to be working since we tried to fix it.
S0146.target: Nada parece estar funcionando desde que intentamos arreglarlo.

S0147.known: She was very kind when she saw me feeling nervous.
S0147.target: Ella era muy amable cuando me vio sintiéndome nervioso.

S0148.known: He wasn't very patient when I couldn't answer.
S0148.target: Él no era muy paciente cuando no pude responder.

S0149.known: This isn't very difficult, so I hope you'll finish soon.
S0149.target: Esto no es muy difícil, entonces espero que termines pronto.

S0150.known: Can you tell me what your name is?

S0151.known: That wasn't what I was hoping would happen.
S0151.target: Eso no era lo que estaba esperando que pasara.

S0152.known: I would have done it differently if I had known what you wanted.
S0152.target: Lo habría hecho diferentemente si hubiera sabido lo que querías.

S0153.known: I wouldn't have said it in exactly the same way.
S0153.target: No lo habría dicho exactamente de la misma manera.

S0154.known: Where do you want to meet on Saturday night?
S0154.target: ¿Dónde quieres encontrarte el sábado por la noche?

S0155.known: I don't mind waiting for a few minutes tomorrow morning.
S0155.target: No me importa esperar unos minutos mañana por la mañana.

S0156.known: Do you want to go to a restaurant tonight?
S0156.target: ¿Quieres ir a un restaurante esta noche?

S0157.known: I won't be able to be there next month.
S0157.target: No podré estar ahí el próximo mes.

S0159.known: That isn't what I'm trying to say.
S0159.target: Eso no es lo que estoy intentando decir.

S0160.known: How do you say this word in Spanish?

S0161.known: Can you give me that book on Sunday morning?
S0161.target: ¿Puedes darme ese libro el domingo por la mañana?

S0162.known: What do you think about that?

S0165.known: But I'm not sure if it's true.
S0165.target: Pero no estoy seguro si es verdad.

S0166.known: My name is not very unusual.
S0166.target: Mi nombre no es muy inusual.

S0167.known: What do you need to do tomorrow afternoon?
S0167.target: ¿Qué necesitas hacer mañana por la tarde?

S0168.known: And then I'll be able to come and help later on.
S0168.target: Y entonces podré venir y ayudar más tarde.

S0169.known: What do you want me to do?

S0170.known: I'd like you to tell me what you need.
S0170.target: Me gustaría que me dijeras lo que necesitas.

S0171.known: Do you want me to help you look for it?

S0172.known: Yes that would be very helpful.

S0173.known: No thank you I can manage on my own.
S0173.target: No gracias, puedo manejarlo por mi cuenta.

S0174.known: Can you understand what I'm saying?

S0175.known: What do you want to do on Sunday morning?
S0175.target: ¿Qué quieres hacer el domingo por la mañana?

S0176.known: I'll ask him if he'll be able to help next year.
S0176.target: Le preguntaré si podrá ayudar el año próximo.

S0177.known: I'll ask her where she wants to go.

S0178.known: I didn't have time, although I wanted to see you.
S0178.target: No tuve tiempo, aunque quería verte.

S0179.known: What are you going to do on Sunday afternoon?
S0179.target: ¿Qué vas a hacer el domingo por la tarde?

S0180.known: I'd like to read my book for a while.
S0180.target: Me gustaría leer mi libro por un rato.

S0181.known: But I have to take my mother to the doctor.
S0181.target: Pero tengo que llevar a mi madre al doctor.

S0182.known: Have you seen my keys anywhere?
S0182.target: ¿Has visto mis llaves en algún lugar?

S0183.known: No I'm afraid I haven't seen them.
S0183.target: No, me temo que no las he visto.

S0184.known: Yes I saw them in the office a while ago.
S0184.target: Sí las vi en la oficina hace un rato.

S0185.known: I think you left them at work.
S0185.target: Creo que las dejaste en el trabajo.

S0186.known: Do you want to talk about something different next week?
S0186.target: ¿Quieres hablar de algo diferente la semana próxima?

S0188.known: So I don't need to change.

S0189.target: Sí, esa es una buena idea.

S0190.known: Do you mind if I ask you some questions?
S0190.target: ¿Te importa si te hago algunas preguntas?

S0191.known: No I don't mind at all.
S0191.target: No, no me importa en absoluto.

S0192.target: Estoy ocupado mañana por la noche.

S0193.known: I'm sorry but I'm too busy today.
S0193.target: Lo siento pero estoy demasiado ocupado hoy.

S0195.known: I'm trying to find the money I left on the table.
S0195.target: Estoy intentando encontrar el dinero que dejé en la mesa.

S0196.known: Have you heard the latest idea?

S0197.known: My son works as a teacher.

S0198.known: My daughter works for the council.
S0198.target: Mi hija trabaja para el consejo.

S0199.known: My friend used to work in an office.
S0199.target: Mi amigo solía trabajar en una oficina.

S0200.known: They say they want to make sure that we finish everything in time.
S0200.target: Dicen que quieren asegurarse de que terminemos todo a tiempo.

S0201.known: We wanted to know what was going to happen.
S0201.target: Queríamos saber qué iba a pasar.

S0202.known: Nobody was sure how to answer the question.
S0202.target: Nadie estaba seguro de cómo responder la pregunta.

S0203.known: What would you do if I asked you to help me?
S0203.target: ¿Qué harías si te pidiera que me ayudaras?

S0204.known: I wanted her to help you to deal with the arrangements.
S0204.target: Quería que ella te ayudara a tratar con los arreglos.

S0205.known: I've forgotten the word I was trying to say.
S0205.target: He olvidado la palabra que estaba intentando decir.

S0206.known: I enjoy the chance to practise speaking with you.
S0206.target: Disfruto la oportunidad de practicar hablar contigo.

S0207.known: You've done what you needed to do.
S0207.target: Has hecho lo que necesitabas hacer.

S0208.known: I didn't want to ask you how to say it.

S0209.known: They want to spend more time meeting as a group.
S0209.target: Quieren pasar más tiempo reuniéndose como grupo.

S0210.known: They think that we need to discuss the problem.
S0210.target: Piensan que necesitamos discutir el problema.

S0211.known: They told us that they didn't want to explain.
S0211.target: Nos dijeron que no querían explicar.

S0212.known: They wanted to ask for help.

S0213.known: We don't know what they're trying to achieve.
S0213.target: No sabemos qué están intentando lograr.

S0214.known: Did you have a good time at the weekend?
S0214.target: ¿Pasaste un buen tiempo el fin de semana?

S0215.known: I went out on Saturday night.
S0215.target: Salí el sábado por la noche.

S0217.known: I had a glass or two of water.
S0217.target: Tuve un vaso o dos de agua.

S0218.known: I didn't do much on Sunday.

S0219.known: It was nice to relax for a while.
S0219.target: Fue agradable relajarse por un rato.

S0220.known: Did you watch a bit of television?

S0221.known: I watched the football and then I watched a film.
S0221.target: Vi el fútbol y luego vi una película.

S0222.known: He's trying to tell me what he wants
S0222.target: Está intentando decirme lo que quiere.

S0223.known: He's going to ask you tomorrow.

S0225.known: He would give you an answer if he could.
S0225.target: Te daría una respuesta si pudiera.

S0226.known: The man is trying to help me.

S0227.known: That man is going to tell me something new.
S0227.target: Ese hombre va a decirme algo nuevo.

S0228.known: That man has just started to practise speaking.
S0228.target: Ese hombre acaba de empezar a practicar el habla.

S0229.known: That woman would help you if she could.
S0229.target: Esa mujer te ayudaría si pudiera.

S0230.known: I know a young man who wants to work with you.
S0230.target: Conozco a un hombre joven que quiere trabajar contigo.

S0231.known: I know an old man who wanted to ask for help.
S0231.target: Conozco a un hombre viejo que quería pedir ayuda.

S0232.known: I know an old woman who can remember the answer.
S0232.target: Conozco a una mujer vieja que puede recordar la respuesta.

S0233.known: I know a young woman who knows your sister.
S0233.target: Conozco a una mujer joven que conoce a tu hermana.

S0234.known: I met someone last night who works with your brother.
S0234.target: Conocí a alguien anoche que trabaja con tu hermano.

S0235.known: I met someone who said that he wanted to tell you something.
S0235.target: Conocí a alguien que dijo que quería decirte algo.

S0236.known: I know someone who said that she was going to try to help.
S0236.target: Conozco a alguien que dijo que iba a intentar ayudar.

S0237.known: He wanted me to tell you before the weekend.
S0237.target: Quería que te dijera antes del fin de semana.

S0238.known: He wanted you to tell me yesterday.

S0239.target: A mi madre le gusta leer.

S0240.known: My father doesn't like to stop talking.
S0240.target: A mi padre no le gusta dejar de hablar.

S0241.known: I don't want to give it to him.

S0242.known: I want to give her more time.

S0243.known: I'm going to ask for the same thing to eat.
S0243.target: Voy a pedir la misma cosa para comer.

S0245.known: I'm happy with how much I've done in a short time
S0245.target: Estoy contento con cuánto he hecho en poco tiempo.

S0246.known: I wanted her to help you but she was too busy.
S0246.target: Quería que ella te ayudara pero estaba demasiado ocupada.

S0247.known: I thought that book was fairly good.
S0247.target: Pensé que ese libro era bastante bueno.

S0248.known: I thought the film was complete rubbish and I want my money back.
S0248.target: Pensé que la película era basura completa y quiero mi dinero de vuelta.

S0249.known: I want you to help me before you go.
S0249.target: Quiero que me ayudes antes de que te vayas.

S0250.known: Can you tell me something else before I answer?
S0250.target: ¿Puedes decirme algo más antes de que responda?

S0251.known: I don't want to find out until after we finish.
S0251.target: No quiero descubrir hasta después de que terminemos.

S0252.known: When will you be ready to start?

S0253.known: I should be ready in a few minutes.
S0253.target: Debo estar preparado en unos pocos minutos.

S0254.known: I've been ready since this morning.
S0254.target: He estado preparado desde esta mañana.

S0255.known: When do you think you'll be ready to leave?
S0255.target: ¿Cuándo crees que estarás preparado para salir?

S0256.known: I think I'll be ready in less than an hour.
S0256.target: Creo que estaré listo en menos de una hora.

S0258.known: What's that blue thing over there?
S0258.target: ¿Qué es esa cosa azul de allí?

S0260.known: I don't have the faintest idea.
S0260.target: No tengo ni la más mínima idea.

S0261.known: I think it might be something important.
S0261.target: Creo que puede ser algo importante.

S0262.known: Who was that man you were talking to yesterday?
S0262.target: ¿Quién era ese hombre con el que hablabas ayer?

S0263.known: I don't know who you mean.

S0266.known: He was an old friend of my father.
S0266.target: Era un viejo amigo de mi padre.

S0267.known: Have you heard from your friend?

S0268.known: Yes she sent me two emails last week.
S0268.target: Sí, me envió dos correos electrónicos la semana pasada.

S0269.known: Why don't you want to wait for your father?
S0269.target: ¿Por qué no quieres esperar a tu padre?

S0270.known: Because I'm worried that I'm going to be late.
S0270.target: Porque estoy preocupado de que voy a llegar tarde.

S0271.known: Would you like to come with us next month?
S0271.target: ¿Te gustaría venir con nosotros el próximo mes?

S0272.known: Yes that sounds like a great idea.
S0272.target: Sí eso suena como una gran idea.

S0273.known: No unfortunately I've got too much work.

S0274.known: Do you have to leave in a few days?
S0274.target: ¿Tienes que salir en unos pocos días?

S0276.known: No I can stay here for a little longer.
S0276.target: No, puedo quedarme aquí un poco más de tiempo.

S0277.known: Yes I've got an important meeting early next week.
S0277.target: Sí tengo una reunión importante a principios de la próxima semana.

S0278.known: Did you have to finish everything last night?

S0279.known: Yes because there wasn't much time left.
S0279.target: Sí porque no quedaba mucho tiempo.

S0280.known: No I only had to do the most important job.
S0280.target: No solo tuve que hacer el trabajo más importante.

S0281.known: Do you mind if I finish my coffee before you start?
S0281.target: ¿Te importa si termino mi café antes de que empieces?

S0282.target: No, eso no es un problema.

S0283.known: Which of your friends speak Spanish?

S0284.known: Do you know my sister's friend?
S0284.target: ¿Conoces a la amiga de mi hermana?

S0286.target: Personas a las que les gusta hablar español.

S0287.known: How many people do you know who like watching television?
S0287.target: ¿Cuántas personas conoces a las que les gusta ver la televisión?

S0288.known: Most people I know like watching television.
S0288.target: A la mayoría de la gente que conozco le gusta ver la televisión.

S0289.known: I wonder if she's going to be there this afternoon.
S0289.target: Me pregunto si ella va a estar allí esta tarde.

S0290.known: I wonder if he knows the answer.
S0290.target: Me pregunto si él sabe la respuesta.

S0291.known: I hope I'll be able to speak better soon.

S0292.known: I hope you'll be able to come to the party.
S0292.target: Espero que puedas venir a la fiesta.

S0293.known: I have to find out where he's going to meet me.
S0293.target: Tengo que descubrir dónde va a reunirse conmigo.

S0294.known: I don't have enough time to call you tonight.
S0294.target: No tengo suficiente tiempo para llamarte esta noche.

S0295.known: I didn't say that I wanted to finish in a day.
S0295.target: No dije que quería terminar en un día.

S0296.known: I said that I needed a little more time.
S0296.target: Dije que necesitaba un poco más de tiempo.

S0297.known: I don't know many people who speak Spanish.
S0297.target: No conozco a muchas personas que hablan español.

S0298.known: I've got nothing left to say.
S0298.target: No me queda nada que decir.

S0300.known: She doesn't want to seem unfriendly.

S0301.known: He said that he wants to show you something.
S0301.target: Él dijo que quiere mostrarte algo.

S0302.known: She said that she doesn't want to live in a city.
S0302.target: Ella dijo que no quiere vivir en una ciudad.

S0303.known: I think that he wants to sit down.

S0304.known: I think that she doesn't want to work from home.
S0304.target: Creo que ella no quiere trabajar desde casa.

S0306.known: I know that young woman who's talking to your friend.
S0306.target: Conozco a esa mujer joven que está hablando con tu amigo.

S0307.known: I know that young man who's sitting over there.
S0307.target: Conozco a ese hombre joven que está sentado allí.

S0308.known: Yes she's a friend of my mother.
S0308.target: Sí ella es una amiga de mi madre.

S0309.known: No I've never seen her before.
S0309.target: No nunca la he visto antes.

S0310.known: She could write a story about that man.
S0310.target: Ella podría escribir una historia sobre ese hombre.

S0311.known: He couldn't believe the three most important facts.
S0311.target: Él no podría creer los tres hechos más importantes.

S0312.known: She said that she could use the other room tomorrow night.
S0312.target: Ella dijo que podría usar la otra habitación mañana por la noche.

S0313.known: He said that he couldn't watch all five games.
S0313.target: Él dijo que no podría ver todos los cinco juegos.

S0314.known: I think that she could put it on the table.
S0314.target: Creo que ella podría ponerlo en la mesa.

S0315.known: I think that he couldn't afford the car that he wanted.
S0315.target: Creo que no podría permitirse el coche que quería.

S0316.known: Do you think that she could bring her brother on Monday?
S0316.target: ¿Crees que ella podría traer a su hermano el lunes?

S0317.known: Yes I think she could if she wanted to.
S0317.target: Sí pienso que podría si quisiera.

S0318.known: No I don't think she could this time.
S0318.target: No, no creo que pudiera esta vez.

S0319.known: She needs to move to a different country.
S0319.target: Ella necesita mudarse a un país diferente.

S0320.known: He doesn't need to buy another television this year.
S0320.target: Él no necesita comprar otra televisión este año.

S0322.known: She said that she needs to read the same book.
S0322.target: Ella dijo que necesita leer el mismo libro.

S0323.known: He said that he doesn't need to walk to school.
S0323.target: Él dijo que no necesita caminar a la escuela.

S0324.known: That student has both of her hands up.
S0324.target: Esa estudiante tiene las dos manos arriba.

S0325.known: I think that he needs to consider ten possible problems.
S0325.target: Creo que necesita considerar diez problemas posibles.

S0326.known: I don't think that she needs to sell the company.
S0326.target: No creo que necesite vender la compañía.

S0327.known: Do you think that she needs to offer another way?

S0328.known: Yes I think she ought to.

S0330.known: No I don't think it's very important.
S0330.target: No, no creo que sea muy importante.

S0331.known: She can't provide all the answers.
S0331.target: Ella no puede proveer todas las respuestas.

S0332.known: He can build a new life for his sister.
S0332.target: Él puede construir una nueva vida para su hermana.

S0333.known: She said that she can't spend much time with the group.
S0333.target: Ella dijo que no puede pasar mucho tiempo con el grupo.

S0334.known: He said that he can let you hold the kitten
S0334.target: Él dijo que puede dejarte sostener el gatito

S0335.known: I think that he can add some valuable ideas.
S0335.target: Creo que puede añadir algunas ideas valiosas.

S0336.known: I don't think that she can open the door.
S0336.target: No creo que pueda abrir la puerta.

S0337.known: Do you think that he can continue to play?

S0339.known: No I think he's hurt himself quite badly.
S0339.target: No, pienso que se ha lastimado bastante mal.

S0340.known: Yes I'm sure he's going to be okay.
S0340.target: Sí, estoy seguro que va a estar bien.

S0341.known: I met someone a few days ago.
S0341.target: Conocí a alguien hace unos días.

S0342.known: I met someone who said something.
S0342.target: Conocí a alguien que dijo algo.

S0343.known: Who said that she's worried about the economy.
S0343.target: Que dijo que está preocupada por la economía.

S0344.known: Who said that he's happy to help you.
S0344.target: Que dijo que está contento de ayudarte.

S0345.known: Who said that he's not ready to leave yet.
S0345.target: Que dijo que no está preparado para irse todavía.

S0346.known: I wanted her to know that I liked her book.
S0346.target: Quería que ella supiera que me gustó su libro.

S0347.known: He wanted to know what was happening a week ago.
S0347.target: Él quería saber qué estaba pasando hace una semana.

S0348.known: She didn't want to know what was going to happen.
S0348.target: Ella no quería saber qué iba a pasar.

S0349.known: Did he want to go out on Friday night?
S0349.target: ¿Quería él salir el viernes por la noche?

S0350.known: Yes he wanted to see some old friends.
S0350.target: Sí él quería ver a unos amigos viejos.

S0351.known: No he didn't want to leave me on my own.
S0351.target: No él no quería dejarme solo.

S0352.known: Even if he wanted to he wouldn't be able to.

S0353.known: She needed to run around the field.
S0353.target: Ella necesitaba correr alrededor del campo.

S0354.known: He didn't need to appear angry.

S0355.known: Did she need to talk to that woman you know?
S0355.target: ¿Necesitaba ella hablar con esa mujer que conoces?

S0356.known: Yes they had something important to discuss.
S0356.target: Sí ellos tenían algo importante que discutir.

S0357.known: No she just wanted to send her a message.
S0357.target: No ella solo quería enviarle un mensaje.

S0358.known: Your friend said that she couldn't reach the top.
S0358.target: Tu amigo dijo que ella no podía alcanzar la cima.

S0359.known: Your friend said that he could turn left.
S0359.target: Tu amigo dijo que él podía girar a la izquierda.

S0360.known: Did your friend say anything else?

S0362.known: No he was rather quiet after you left.
S0362.target: No él estaba bastante callado después de que te fuiste.

S0363.known: Yes he felt like talking a lot.
S0363.target: Sí él tenía ganas de hablar mucho.

S0364.known: I heard that he didn't like that place.
S0364.target: Escuché que a él no le gustó ese lugar.

S0365.known: I didn't hear what she said to him.
S0365.target: No escuché lo que ella le dijo a él.

S0366.known: Did you hear what he wanted to grow?

S0368.known: Yes I heard that he wanted to grow tomatoes.
S0368.target: Sí escuché que él quería cultivar tomates.

S0369.known: I saw several horses on the road.
S0369.target: Vi varios caballos en la carretera.

S0370.known: I didn't see anyone that I knew.
S0370.target: No vi a nadie que yo conocía.

S0371.known: I went to see a film on Wednesday.
S0371.target: Fui a ver una película el miércoles.

S0372.known: Did you see what she was trying to create?
S0372.target: ¿Viste lo que ella estaba intentando crear?

S0374.known: Yes I thought it was very beautiful.
S0374.target: Sí pensé que era muy hermoso.

S0375.known: No I didn't know what she was doing.
S0375.target: No no sabía qué estaba haciendo.

S0376.known: I didn't go anywhere last month.
S0376.target: No fui a ninguna parte el mes pasado.

S0377.known: Did you go anywhere in the world last year?
S0377.target: ¿Fuiste a alguna parte en el mundo el año pasado?

S0378.known: No I didn't have enough money for holidays.
S0378.target: No no tenía suficiente dinero para vacaciones.

S0379.known: Yes I was lucky enough to travel to Africa.
S0379.target: Sí tuve suficiente suerte para viajar a África.

S0380.known: I asked what she wanted to include.

S0381.known: I didn't ask if he wanted to follow us.

S0382.known: Did you ask where he wanted to put it?

S0383.known: Yes he said he wanted to put it in the garden.
S0383.target: Sí dijo que quería ponerlo en el jardín.

S0384.known: I couldn't agree with what he said a moment ago.
S0384.target: No pude estar de acuerdo con lo que dijo hace un momento.

S0386.target: Sí estuve de acuerdo con ella.

S0387.known: No I didn't think she was right.
S0387.target: No no pensé que tenía razón.

S0388.target: Esa persona con la que trabajas.

S0390.known: The one who is standing near the entrance.
S0390.target: La que está de pie cerca de la entrada.

S0391.known: The one who is walking towards the bus.
S0391.target: La que está caminando hacia el autobús.

S0392.known: That child with the black hair opposite the post office.
S0392.target: Ese niño con el pelo negro enfrente de la oficina de correos.

S0393.known: That boy with the green shirt.
S0393.target: Ese niño con la camisa verde.

S0394.known: That girl with the yellow dress.
S0394.target: Esa niña con el vestido amarillo.

S0395.known: We need to turn left at the next corner.
S0395.target: Necesitamos girar a la izquierda en la próxima esquina.

S0396.known: We don't need to stand until everybody else is ready.
S0396.target: No necesitamos estar de pie hasta que todos los demás estén preparados.

S0397.known: Do we need to get ready soon?

S0398.known: We want to become more patient with our children.
S0398.target: Queremos volvernos más pacientes con nuestros niños.

S0399.known: We don't want to lose hope.

S0400.known: Do we want to eat something later on?

S0401.known: No it would be better to go straight home.
S0401.target: No, sería mejor ir directamente a casa.

S0402.known: Yes it would be nice to stop somewhere for food.
S0402.target: Sí, sería agradable parar en algún lugar para comida.

S0403.known: We should remain quiet for as long as possible.
S0403.target: Deberíamos permanecer callados durante tanto tiempo como sea posible.

S0404.known: We shouldn't expect to finish before Thursday.
S0404.target: No deberíamos esperar terminar antes del jueves.

S0405.known: Should we ask if we have to book?

S0406.known: No I'm sure it will be okay.
S0406.target: No, estoy seguro de que estará bien.

S0407.known: Shouldn't we try to set a good example?
S0407.target: ¿No deberíamos intentar establecer un buen ejemplo?

S0408.known: Yes that's the best way to make a happy family.
S0408.target: Sí esa es la mejor manera de hacer una familia feliz.

S0409.known: No it doesn't matter what we do.
S0409.target: No no importa lo que hagamos.

S0410.known: They still fight with each other.
S0410.target: Todavía luchan el uno con el otro.

S0411.known: We would like to reserve a table for four tonight.
S0411.target: Nos gustaría reservar una mesa para cuatro esta noche.

S0412.known: We couldn't allow them to win everything.

S0413.known: We could fall if we go too close to the edge.
S0413.target: Podríamos caer si vamos demasiado cerca del borde.

S0414.known: Could we have a bottle of red wine please?
S0414.target: ¿Podríamos tener una botella de vino tinto por favor?

S0415.known: That wouldn't be a problem if you ask me.
S0415.target: Eso no sería un problema si me preguntas.

S0416.known: They want to lead the way next year.
S0416.target: Quieren liderar el camino el próximo año.

S0417.known: Do they want to kill those ants?

S0418.known: They need to serve the community.

S0419.known: If they want people to like them.
S0419.target: Si quieren que la gente los quiera.

S0420.known: They don't need to ask how old he is.
S0420.target: No necesitan preguntar cuántos años tiene.

S0421.known: Because they already know he's getting weak.
S0421.target: Porque ya saben que se está poniendo débil.

S0423.known: Do they need to ask such an obvious question?

S0424.target: No están perdiendo el tiempo de todos.

S0425.known: Yes they need to make sure they understand.
S0425.target: Sí necesitan asegurarse de que entienden.

S0426.known: They would like to love each other but they're unhappy.
S0426.target: Les gustaría amarse pero están infelices.

S0427.known: They wouldn't like you to think that they're bored.
S0427.target: No les gustaría que pienses que están aburridos.

S0428.known: Would they like to visit us on Tuesday?

S0429.known: Yes that would be perfect for them.
S0429.target: Sí eso sería perfecto para ellos.

S0431.known: They're not ready yet but they'll be ready soon.
S0431.target: Todavía no están preparados pero van a estar preparados pronto.

S0432.known: They could mean that they want you to ask.
S0432.target: Podrían significar que quieren que preguntes.

S0433.known: They couldn't find out when the film started.
S0433.target: No pudieron descubrir cuándo empezó la película.

S0434.known: Could they cut the number of students they take?
S0434.target: ¿Podrían reducir el número de estudiantes que toman?

S0435.known: Yes they could if they wanted to.

S0436.known: No there's a minimum number they need.
S0436.target: No hay un número mínimo que necesitan.

S0437.known: They wanted to raise as much as possible for charity.
S0437.target: Querían recaudar tanto como posible para caridad.

S0438.known: They didn't want to decide what he should do.
S0438.target: No querían decidir lo que debería hacer.

S0440.known: They want to travel while they're still young.
S0440.target: Quieren viajar mientras todavía son jóvenes.

S0442.known: Did they want to develop a new approach?

S0443.known: No they wanted to keep doing it the same way.
S0443.target: No querían continuar haciéndolo de la misma manera.

S0444.known: Yes they thought it could be done more efficiently.
S0444.target: Sí pensaban que podría hacerse más eficientemente.

S0445.known: They will be able to carry that suitcase.
S0445.target: Ellos van a poder llevar esa maleta.

S0446.known: They won't be able to break that window.
S0446.target: Ellos no van a poder romper esa ventana.

S0447.known: Will they be able to drive us home after the meal?
S0447.target: ¿Van a poder llevarnos a casa después de la comida?

S0448.known: Yes they'll be happy to help.
S0448.target: Sí van a estar contentos de ayudar.

S0449.known: They said that they were almost ready.
S0449.target: Ellos dijeron que estaban casi preparados.

S0450.known: No they have to catch the train themselves.
S0450.target: No ellos tienen que tomar el tren ellos mismos.

S0451.known: They said what they wanted to do.
S0451.target: Ellos dijeron lo que querían hacer.

S0452.known: They didn't say what they wanted to do.
S0452.target: Ellos no dijeron lo que querían hacer.

S0453.known: Did they say who they saw last night?

S0454.known: Our friends came round at about six o'clock.
S0454.target: Nuestros amigos vinieron como a las seis.

S0455.known: We had to leave because the children were tired.
S0455.target: Tuvimos que irnos porque los niños estaban cansados.

S0456.known: He might be there but it's not very likely.
S0456.target: Puede que esté allí pero no es muy probable.

S0457.known: Part of the problem is the number of different areas.
S0457.target: Parte del problema es el número de áreas diferentes.

S0458.known: It was all much easier in the past.
S0458.target: Todo era mucho más fácil en el pasado.

S0459.known: It wasn't in front of the blue sign.
S0459.target: No estaba enfrente de la señal azul.

S0460.known: I want to find a shop near the hotel.
S0460.target: Quiero encontrar una tienda cerca del hotel.

S0461.known: A shop where I can buy some postcards.
S0461.target: Una tienda donde puedo comprar algunas postales.

S0462.known: My grandfather fought in Italy during the war.
S0462.target: Mi abuelo combatió en Italia durante la guerra.

S0464.known: I told her my room number once but she forgot it.
S0464.target: Le dije mi número de habitación una vez pero ella lo olvidó.

S0465.known: Next time I will ask her what her name is.
S0465.target: La próxima vez voy a preguntarle cuál es su nombre.

S0466.known: Let me throw it over the wall.

S0467.known: It's next to the car park.

S0469.known: But that doesn't mean we can't change it.
S0469.target: Pero eso no significa que no podamos cambiarlo.

S0470.known: How high do you want to climb before we stop?
S0470.target: ¿Qué tan alto quieres escalar antes de que paremos?

S0471.known: Do you want to stop for a rest?

S0472.known: Part of the problem is that we don't know the facts.
S0472.target: Parte del problema es que no sabemos los hechos.

S0474.known: I don't even want it as a free offer.
S0474.target: Ni siquiera lo quiero como oferta gratuita.

S0475.known: There are many reasons to consider waiting.
S0475.target: Hay muchas razones para considerar esperar.

S0476.known: I'm waiting for the end of the second half.
S0476.target: Estoy esperando el final de la segunda mitad.

S0477.known: He's been sick since the second day of the holidays.
S0477.target: Él ha estado enfermo desde el segundo día de las vacaciones.

S0478.known: She has such a kind heart.
S0478.target: Ella tiene un corazón tan amable.

S0479.known: It's the least I could do.
S0479.target: Es lo mínimo que podría hacer.

S0480.known: Whatever he says it's not far ahead now.
S0480.target: Lo que sea que él diga no está muy lejos ahora.

S0481.known: It's the only real hope we have left.
S0481.target: Es la única esperanza real que nos queda.

S0482.known: The only real hope is that they're not serious.
S0482.target: La única esperanza real es que no son serios.

S0483.known: Life isn't easy but it's not meant to be easy.
S0483.target: La vida no es fácil pero no está destinada a ser fácil.

S0484.known: It's meant to be a challenge.
S0484.target: Está destinada a ser un desafío.

S0485.known: Nothing would make me happier than to get away.
S0485.target: Nada me haría más feliz que escapar.

S0486.known: I think your eyes are beautiful.
S0486.target: Creo que tus ojos son hermosos.

S0488.known: It's on the other side of that yellow line.
S0488.target: Está al otro lado de esa línea amarilla.

S0489.known: If you don't make me a strong cup of coffee right now.
S0489.target: Si no me haces una taza de café fuerte ahora mismo.

S0490.known: Then I will never trust anyone ever again.
S0490.target: Entonces nunca confiaré en nadie nunca más.

S0491.known: I love the way you try to help.
S0491.target: Me encanta la forma en que intentas ayudar.

S0492.known: Which of those places do you think is the most interesting?
S0492.target: ¿Cuál de esos lugares crees que es el más interesante?

S0494.known: What happens after the first part of the show?
S0494.target: ¿Qué pasa después de la primera parte del espectáculo?

S0496.known: I'm not planning to lose when it really matters.
S0496.target: No estoy planeando perder cuando realmente importa.

S0497.known: That sounds as though you need to get some sleep.
S0497.target: Eso suena como si necesitaras dormir un poco.

S0498.known: He's standing alone over there inside the entrance.
S0498.target: Está de pie solo allá dentro de la entrada.

S0499.known: Maybe we should open the door and close the window.
S0499.target: Quizás deberíamos abrir la puerta y cerrar la ventana.

S0500.known: Why don't you want to sit between the two girls?
S0500.target: ¿Por qué no quieres sentarte entre las dos chicas?

S0501.known: If only I could trust you to play together without arguing.
S0501.target: Si tan solo pudiera confiar en ti para jugar juntos sin discutir.

S0502.known: She almost got lost because she turned left instead of right.
S0502.target: Casi se perdió porque giró a la izquierda en lugar de a la derecha.

S0503.known: I hate making trouble but that one's mine.
S0503.target: Odio causar problemas pero ese es mío.

S0504.known: I'm going to run across the grass.
S0504.target: Voy a correr a través del césped.

S0505.known: So that I don't get left behind.
S0505.target: Para que no me quede atrás.

S0506.known: I used to live around here years ago before we moved.
S0506.target: Solía vivir por aquí hace años antes de que nos mudáramos.

S0508.known: There's no point worrying about how you're going to pay.
S0508.target: No tiene sentido preocuparse por cómo vas a pagar.

S0509.known: I heard that you're going to pay for a new bed.
S0509.target: Oí que vas a pagar por una cama nueva.

S0510.known: She's gone to look for somewhere safe to park the car.
S0510.target: Ha ido a buscar algún lugar seguro para estacionar el carro.

S0511.known: The news took several hours to reach everyone in the office.
S0511.target: Las noticias tardaron varias horas en llegar a todos en la oficina.

S0512.known: Can you hold the door open while I fetch the keys?
S0512.target: ¿Puedes mantener la puerta abierta mientras busco las llaves?

S0513.known: It hurts most when I move my head up and down.
S0513.target: Me duele más cuando muevo la cabeza arriba y abajo.

S0514.known: I found the perfect house on the first day.
S0514.target: Encontré la casa perfecta el primer día.

S0515.known: On the first day of the new year.
S0515.target: En el primer día del año nuevo.

S0516.known: They both came on their own.

S0517.known: But they left with each other.
S0517.target: Pero se fueron el uno con el otro.

S0518.known: I couldn't imagine myself having exactly the same problem.
S0518.target: No podría imaginarme teniendo exactamente el mismo problema.

S0519.known: I haven't seen their new baby yet.
S0519.target: No he visto a su nuevo bebé todavía.

S0520.known: It might have happened to the whole family.
S0520.target: Podría haberle pasado a toda la familia.

S0521.known: I'm afraid that you'll forget why we needed to stay here.
S0521.target: Tengo miedo de que olvides por qué necesitábamos quedarnos aquí.

S0522.known: Let's agree that it was stupid to tell the truth.
S0522.target: Acordemos que fue estúpido decir la verdad.

S0523.target: En lugar de dar una excusa.

S0524.known: I'll call you back in three or four minutes.
S0524.target: Te llamaré de vuelta en tres o cuatro minutos.

S0525.known: To check if you've been able to finish.
S0525.target: Para comprobar si has podido terminar.

S0526.known: I'm finding it hard to believe that you can't guess.
S0526.target: Me resulta difícil creer que no puedes adivinar.

S0527.known: Guess who told me that funny story.
S0527.target: Adivina quién me contó esa historia graciosa.

S0528.known: I'm probably supposed to keep those things in another room.
S0528.target: Probablemente se supone que debo guardar esas cosas en otra habitación.

S0529.known: Can you all put your hands up?

S0531.known: It isn't true that anyone can win the game.
S0531.target: No es verdad que cualquiera pueda ganar el juego.

S0533.known: She won't listen to every word you say.
S0533.target: No escuchará cada palabra que dices.

S0534.known: Let's not go outside in this dreadful weather.
S0534.target: No vayamos afuera con este clima espantoso.

S0535.known: He made a promise that he wouldn't choose the wrong job.
S0535.target: Hizo una promesa de que no elegiría el trabajo equivocado.

S0536.known: I used to think that being crazy was bad.
S0536.target: Solía pensar que ser loco era malo.

S0538.known: I don't want to seem as though I don't care.
S0538.target: No quiero parecer como si no me importara.

S0540.known: I don't mind if you want to leave without the car.
S0540.target: No me importa si quieres irte sin el coche.

S0541.known: It's a good idea to try and breathe slowly.
S0541.target: Es una buena idea intentar respirar despacio.

S0542.target: Cuando sea que te sientas enojado.

S0544.known: Whoever said it would be difficult was absolutely right.
S0544.target: Quien sea que dijo que sería difícil tenía absolutamente razón.

S0545.known: It's your turn to take the clean clothes upstairs.
S0545.target: Es tu turno de llevar la ropa limpia arriba.

S0546.known: The dog is dirty and wet.
S0546.target: El perro está sucio y mojado.

S0547.known: Because he has been playing in the mud.
S0547.target: Porque ha estado jugando en el barro.

S0548.known: I am feeling sad at the moment.
S0548.target: Me estoy sintiendo triste en este momento.

S0549.known: Because I have got to be quiet.

S0552.known: The church at the other end of the village is ugly.
S0552.target: La iglesia al otro final del pueblo es fea.

S0553.known: I think the small church is very ugly.
S0553.target: Creo que la iglesia pequeña es muy fea.

S0555.known: And I'm too tired to fetch a new one.
S0555.target: Y estoy demasiado cansado para traer una nueva.

S0556.known: They play music late at night.
S0556.target: Tocan música tarde en la noche.

S0557.known: I wish they wouldn't play such loud music.
S0557.target: Desearía que no tocaran música tan alta.

S0558.target: Es tan tarde en la noche.

S0559.known: Have you found the path through the wood?
S0559.target: ¿Has encontrado el camino por el bosque?

S0560.known: It goes down to the beach.
S0560.target: Va hacia abajo a la playa.

S0561.known: I don't care if it's a fast car.
S0561.target: No me importa si es un carro rápido.

S0562.known: I just want to get there safely.
S0562.target: Solo quiero llegar allí con seguridad.

S0563.known: I wouldn't have been able to keep going any longer.
S0563.target: No habría podido continuar más tiempo.

S0564.known: I wouldn't have been able to without your help.
S0564.target: No habría podido sin tu ayuda.

S0565.known: I'd have thought about it more carefully.
S0565.target: Habría pensado en ello más cuidadosamente.

S0566.known: I'd have thought more if it had been my choice.
S0566.target: Habría pensado más si hubiera sido mi elección.

S0567.known: It's been lovely spending time outdoors watching the children play.
S0567.target: Ha sido encantador pasar tiempo al aire libre observando a los niños jugar.

S0568.known: I'm expecting to see an improvement next time we meet.
S0568.target: Espero ver una mejora la próxima vez que nos encontremos.

S0569.known: Have you decided how much you are willing to pay?
S0569.target: ¿Has decidido cuánto estás dispuesto a pagar?

S0570.known: How much are you willing to pay for your ticket?
S0570.target: ¿Cuánto estás dispuesto a pagar por tu billete?

S0571.known: I'm not convinced that would be a very good idea.
S0571.target: No estoy convencido de que eso sería una muy buena idea.

S0572.known: Have you forgotten what happened the last time they visited us?
S0572.target: ¿Has olvidado lo que pasó la última vez que nos visitaron?

S0573.known: It's the kind of thing that makes the holidays very special.
S0573.target: Es el tipo de cosa que hace que las vacaciones sean muy especiales.

S0574.known: The holidays are very special for everyone.
S0574.target: Las vacaciones son muy especiales para todos.

S0576.known: It has been very upsetting waiting.

S0577.known: We've been waiting for the news from the hospital.
S0577.target: Hemos estado esperando las noticias del hospital.

S0580.known: We've often wanted to take the children somewhere a little warmer.
S0580.target: Frecuentemente hemos querido llevar a los niños a algún lugar un poco más cálido.

S0581.known: He'd like to know a little more about what it's like.
S0581.target: Le gustaría saber un poco más sobre cómo es.

S0582.known: What's it like to grow up here?

S0583.known: What's it like in this part of the world?
S0583.target: ¿Cómo es en esta parte del mundo?

S0584.known: What's it like to wake up every morning and see the mountains?
S0584.target: ¿Cómo es despertar cada mañana y ver las montañas?

S0585.known: I can see the mountains out of my bedroom window.
S0585.target: Puedo ver las montañas desde la ventana de mi dormitorio.

S0587.known: She used to insist that we had eggs for supper.
S0587.target: Ella solía insistir en que teníamos huevos para la cena.

S0588.known: So I wanted to grow up and leave home.
S0588.target: Así que quería crecer y salir de casa.

S0589.known: She told me she'd just seen the last bus.
S0589.target: Ella me dijo que acababa de ver el último autobús.

S0590.known: I saw the last bus leaving the station.
S0590.target: Vi el último autobús saliendo de la estación.

S0591.known: She followed me down to the shops.
S0591.target: Ella me siguió hasta las tiendas.

S0593.known: However much I argued I still had to share.
S0593.target: Por mucho que argumenté todavía tuve que compartir.

S0594.known: I had to share my toys with my sister.
S0594.target: Tuve que compartir mis juguetes con mi hermana.

S0595.known: I need to lie down in the garden.

S0596.known: And I need to close my eyes for a while.
S0596.target: Y necesito cerrar los ojos por un rato.

S0597.known: I suspect that he's heard a hundred stories about it.
S0597.target: Sospecho que ha oído cien historias sobre ello.

S0598.known: He's heard a thousand stories about what they were doing.
S0598.target: Ha oído mil historias sobre lo que estaban haciendo.

S0599.known: I'd have been happy to drive if you'd told me.
S0599.target: Habría estado feliz de conducir si me lo hubieras dicho.

S0600.known: I'd have driven if you'd told me how tired you were.
S0600.target: Habría conducido si me hubieras dicho lo cansado que estabas.

S0601.known: We were talking about how it all started.
S0601.target: Estábamos hablando sobre cómo empezó todo.

S0602.known: How it started in the first place.

S0603.known: We didn't have anywhere to live at the time.
S0603.target: No teníamos ningún lugar donde vivir en ese momento.

S0604.known: She offered to let us stay with her.
S0604.target: Ella se ofreció a dejarnos quedarnos con ella.

S0606.known: If I'd known then what I know now I'd have waited.
S0606.target: Si hubiera sabido entonces lo que sé ahora habría esperado.

S0607.known: If I'd known I'd have done things differently.
S0607.target: Si hubiera sabido habría hecho las cosas de manera diferente.

S0608.known: It would have been the sensible thing to do.
S0608.target: Habría sido lo sensato que hacer.

S0609.known: The sensible thing to do would have been to ask.
S0609.target: Lo sensato que hacer habría sido preguntar.

S0610.known: He needs to look for work.

S0611.known: I would have been ready to look somewhere else.
S0611.target: Yo habría estado preparado para buscar en otro lugar.

S0613.known: We probably would have bought a house there.
S0613.target: Probablemente habríamos comprado una casa allí.

S0614.known: It's near where your family live.
S0614.target: Está cerca de donde vive tu familia.

S0615.known: I thought you were very brave to say that.
S0615.target: Pensé que fuiste muy valiente al decir eso.

S0616.known: You were very brave to say you thought that.
S0616.target: Fuiste muy valiente al decir que pensabas eso.

S0617.known: You thought that it was a mistake.

S0618.known: It doesn't feel like a long time.

S0619.known: It's a long time since we saw each other.
S0619.target: Hace mucho tiempo desde que nos vimos.

S0620.known: It's a very long time since we last saw each other.
S0620.target: Hace muchísimo tiempo desde que nos vimos por última vez.

S0621.known: I wouldn't have dared to tell her that it was broken.
S0621.target: No me habría atrevido a decirle que estaba roto.

S0622.known: I knew that the children had broken it.
S0622.target: Sabía que los niños lo habían roto.

S0623.known: Do you want a cup of coffee or tea?

S0624.known: Yes, that would be great, please.
S0624.target: Sí, eso sería genial, por favor.

S0625.known: Do you want something to drink?

S0626.known: No, I'm not thirsty, thank you.

S0629.known: I like it with milk but without sugar.
S0629.target: Me gusta con leche pero sin azúcar.

S0630.known: Can I have something to drink please?
S0630.target: ¿Puedo tener algo para beber por favor?

S0633.known: A large glass of water would be fine.
S0633.target: Un vaso grande de agua estaría bien.

S0635.target: Esa es la bolsa de Jane.

S0636.known: I think that that is Jane's bag.
S0636.target: Creo que esa es la bolsa de Jane.

S0641.known: I think that it's the red one on that chair.
S0641.target: Pienso que es el rojo en esa silla.

S0650.known: Do you want to go madam?

S0654.known: I'm not sure if I can help you, sir.
S0654.target: No estoy seguro de si puedo ayudarte, señor.

S0655.known: I think that you're doing very well, madam.
S0655.target: Creo que estás haciéndolo muy bien, señora.

S0665.known: Do you all want to go?

S0668.known: I hope you'll all be able to go
S0668.target: Espero que todos ustedes puedan ir
